rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall integrating Vastu principles by aligning the main door with the northeast direction. Space for a small waiting area.
An expansive living room with south-west view, ensuring balance and energy flow. Open plan design connecting to the courtyard.
A formal dining room adjacent to the living area, with north-east light and a view of the courtyard.
A modern kitchen designed for efficient workflow, positioned in the northeast corner as per Vastu guidelines.
A guest bedroom with ample closet space and a small en-suite bathroom, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
A spacious master bedroom with south-west orientation for better rest, including a walk-in wardrobe and an ensuite bathroom following Vastu recommendations.
An extra bedroom to complete the 6 BHK layout, designed for personal space with a private balcony.
A dedicated fitness area integrated into the ground floor with east exposure to invite energy and focus, while ensuring adequate ventilation.
A multipurpose utility room for storage of household items and appliances, placed near the kitchen as per Vastu recommendations.
A central courtyard offering natural light, ventilation, and a communal garden space to connect indoor and outdoor living areas. Designed with Vastu considerations for balance.

openings.description: Vastu-aligned door opening providing a welcoming entrance, with dimensions optimized for security and aesthetics.

openings.location: Various locations on the south, east and west walls
openings.description: Large windows to enhance natural light while ensuring privacy. The openings are designed per Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
A double-car garage entrance leading directly to the driveway, integrated with the house layout while maintaining security and accessibility.
